item.description:
11/30/12 - RSVPs Closed.  Good tickets for a group our size are moving quickly.  If you still wish to join us, send me an e-mail and I will tell you where we are sitting so you may try to buy tickets close to us.

11/30/12 - Tickets Purchased.

This is the US Premier of an extremely popular play.  Since this will undoubtedly sell out very early, RSVPs will close on Sunday, December 9th.  I will monitor ticket sales and will close even earlier if it appears that it will sell out before then.

For this Meet-up we will return to the Gamm Theater for the US Premier of "Anne Boleyn." Here is the description on the Gamm's website:

"British playwright Howard Brenton (Paul, Pravda) puts a radically revisionist spin on the life and legacy of Anne Boleyn (Madeleine Lambert), Henry VIII's (Steve Kidd) notorious second wife, in this rollicking, often laugh-out-loud funny drama. Traditionally portrayed as siren pawn or sexual predator, Brenton's Boleyn is witty and confident as she takes on the vicious world of Tudor Court politics to help create Protestant England and remake the world. Don't miss the hit of the past two seasons at Shakespeare's Globe in its U.S. premiere at The Gamm."

Ticket Information

Tickets are $50.25 (including Gamm's Convenience Charge and Paypal's transaction fee.)  The breakdown is as follows: Ticket price: $45.00; GAMM Convenience Charge: $3.50; Paypal transaction fee: $1.75.

Seating is reserved. Therefore, I will purchase all tickets for the group.  See the payment options below.

RSVPs for this Meetup will close on Sunday, December 9th. I will purchase the tickets on the 10th.

Meet-up Logistics

We will meet at the Gamm Theater promptly at 7:30 PM. I will also provide my cell number in case you need to reach me.

Payment Options

When you RSVP, there will be a question asking how you wish to pay for your ticket.  Please note that I must have payment prior to 12/09/12 so I can purchase our tickets.  I'm open to any option other than a personal check.  Here are my preferred choices:

1) Provide your e-mail address and I will send you a Paypal Invoice.  You may use that invoice to pay by credit card or direct bank debit.  Note that you do NOT need a Paypal account to pay by credit card.  This is the preferred option and was used successfully for the past two seasons.

2) I can provide my mailing address and you can send me a cashiers check or money order.  (No personal checks.)  Remember, though, that I need it before 12/09/12.

Refund Policy

Updated 11/30/12 -- Tickets have been purchased.  If you are unable to attend, we can try to find a replacement but the ticket price can no longer be refunded.

Full refunds (including the convenience charge) will be provided if you change your RSVP to "NO" on or before 12/09/12.

Full refunds (including the convenience charge) will be provided if the play is sold out and we are unable to get tickets.

Once tickets are purchased on 12/10/12, no refunds will be provided.  You will be responsible for the disposal of your ticket if you're unable to attend.
item.name: Anne Boleyn
